title: how long do BOUGHT quest lines last?
body:
Per say if i bought one today, would I only have 3 days to complete it (24th is last day to buy it)
or does it give me a flat 14 days or something to complete the quests?

replies.body: Those missions will all be going away once the event is over on the 24th. If you bought them now, since the event is so close to being over you'd only have 3 days left to complete them all.

i know it wasnt your decision, but that's actually fucking retarded. If I bought it the day it ended, was given 8hrs to complete all the missions or say goodbye to my 20$, is complete bs.

why are they not kept for 14 days past the event, considering tickets stay in your inventory till 9/11

Yea, trust, I completely understand your frustration here. It seems a little odd that there wouldn't at least be some type of warning to let you know that the content you're about to purchase has time limitations, but I'm glad I was at least able to clear this up for you before you bought something that you might have regretted later on =\ .
